validationErrors.moreThan8ColumnsWarning: Using more than 8 columns can affect performance

tabs.notLoadedFilter: «Not loaded» - show tabs which are not loaded and/or have zero items

language.title: Language

booru.title: Boorus & Search
booru.shareBooruDialogMsgMobile(param=booruNam:
Share ${booruName: String} config as a link.

Include login/API key?
booru.shareBooruDialogMsgDesktop(param=booruNa:
Copy ${booruName: String} config link to clipboard.

Include login/API key?
booru.booruSharingMsgAndroid:
How to automatically open Booru config links in the app on Android 12 and higher:
1) Tap button below to open system app link defaults settings
2) Tap on «Add link» and select all available options
booru.deleteBooruError: Something went wrong during deletion of a Booru config!
booru.booruDropdownInfo:
Selected booru becomes default after saving.

Default booru appears first in dropdowns
booru.booruConfigLinkCopied: Booru config link copied to clipboard

booruEditor.title: Booru Editor
booruEditor.testBooruFailedMsg: Config parameters may be incorrect, booru doesn't allow api access, request didn't return any data or there was a network error.
booruEditor.booruSameNameExistsError: Booru config with same name already exists
booruEditor.booruSameUrlExistsError: Booru config with same URL already exists
booruEditor.thisBooruConfigWontBeAdded: This booru config won't be added
booruEditor.existingTabsNeedReload: Existing tabs with this Booru need to be reloaded in order to apply changes!
booruEditor.failedVerifyApiHydrus: Failed to verify api access for Hydrus
booruEditor.accessKeyRequestedMsg: Tap okay on Hydrus then apply. You can tap 'Test Booru' afterwards
booruEditor.accessKeyFailedMsg: Do you have the request window open in Hydrus?
booruEditor.hydrusInstructions: To get the Hydrus key you need to open the request dialog in the Hydrus client. Services > Review services > Client api > Add > From API request
booruEditor.booruApiCredsInfo(param=userIdTitle, par: ${userIdTitle: String} and ${apiKeyTitle: String} may be needed with some boorus but in most cases aren't necessary.
booruEditor.booruDefaultInstructions: Fields below may be required for some boorus

interface.title: Interface
interface.appUIModeWarning: Use Desktop mode? May cause issues on mobile. DEPRECATED.
interface.appUIModeHelpDesktop: - Desktop - Ahoviewer Style UI [DEPRECATED, NEEDS REWORK]
interface.appUIModeHelpWarning: [Warning]: Do not set UI Mode to Desktop on a phone you might break the app and might have to wipe your settings including booru configs.
interface.handSideHelp: Adjusts UI element positions to selected side
interface.showSearchBarInPreviewGrid: Show search bar in preview grid
interface.moveInputToTopInSearchView: Move input to top in search view
interface.disableVibrationSubtitle: May still happen on some actions even when disabled
interface.previewQualityHelpSample: - Sample - Medium resolution, app will also load a Thumbnail quality as a placeholder while higher quality loads
interface.previewQualityHelpNote: [Note]: Sample quality can noticeably degrade performance, especially if you have too many columns in preview grid
interface.previewDisplayFallbackHelp: This will be used when Staggered option is not possible
interface.dontScaleImagesWarning: Are you sure you want to disable image scaling?
interface.dontScaleImagesWarningMsg: This can negatively impact the performance, especially on older devices

theme.title: Themes
theme.fontPreviewText: The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog

viewer.title: Viewer
viewer.longPressToChangeItemOrder: Long press to change item order.
viewer.atLeast4ButtonsVisibleOnToolbar: At least 4 buttons from this list will be always visible on Toolbar.
viewer.otherButtonsWillGoIntoOverflow: Other buttons will go into overflow (three dots) menu.
viewer.shareActionsAsk: - Ask - always ask what to share
viewer.shareActionsFileURL: - File URL - shares direct link to the original file (may not work with some sites)
viewer.shareActionsPostURLFileURLFileWithTags: - Post URL/File URL/File with tags - shares url/file and tags which you select
viewer.shareActionsFile: - File - shares the file itself, may take some time to load, progress will be shown on the Share button
viewer.shareActionsHydrus: - Hydrus - sends the post url to Hydrus for import
viewer.shareActionsNoteIfFileSavedInCache: [Note]: If File is saved in cache, it will be loaded from there. Otherwise it will be loaded again from network.
viewer.shareActionsTip: [Tip]: You can open Share actions menu by long pressing Share button.
viewer.volumeButtonsScrollingHelp: Use volume buttons to scroll through previews and viewer

video.title: Video
video.disableVideosHelp: Useful on low end devices that crash when trying to load videos. Gives options to view video in external player or browser instead.
video.longTapToFastForwardVideo: Long tap to fast forward video
video.longTapToFastForwardVideoHelp: When this is enabled toolbar can be hidden with the tap when video controls are visible. [Experimental] May become default behavior in the future.
video.backendDefaultHelp: Based on exoplayer. Has best device compatibility, may have issues with 4K videos, some codecs or older devices
video.backendMPVHelp:
Based on libmpv, has advanced settings which may help fix problems with some codecs/devices
[MAY CAUSE CRASHES]
video.backendMDKHelp:
Based on libmdk, may have better performance for some codecs/devices
[MAY CAUSE CRASHES]
video.mpvSettingsHelp: Try different values of 'MPV' settings below if videos don't work correctly or give codec errors:

cacheModes.title: Video cache modes
cacheModes.streamMode: - Stream - Don't cache, start playing as soon as possible
cacheModes.cacheMode: - Cache - Saves the file to device storage, plays only when download is complete
cacheModes.streamCacheMode: - Stream+Cache - Mix of both, but currently leads to double download
cacheModes.cacheNote: [Note]: Videos will cache only if 'Cache Media' is enabled.
cacheModes.desktopWarning: [Warning]: On desktop Stream mode can work incorrectly for some Boorus.

downloads.pleaseProvideStoragePermission: Please provide storage permission in order to download files

database.title: Database
database.cantLeavePageNow: Can't leave the page right now!
database.sankakuDataUpdating: Sankaku data is being updated, wait until it ends or cancel manually at the bottom of the page
database.databaseInfo: Stores favourites and tracks snatched items
database.indexingInfo:
Speeds up database searches but uses more disk space (up to 2x).

Don't leave page or close app while indexing.
database.searchHistoryFavouritesInfo: Favourited queries are pinned to the top of the list and will not be counted towards the limit.
database.tagTypeFetchingInfo: Fetches tag types from supported boorus
database.appRestartMayBeRequired: An app restart may be required!
database.sankakuNewUrlsInfo: New image urls will be fetched for Sankaku items in your favourites
database.sankakuDontLeavePage: Don't leave this page until the process is complete or stopped
database.failedItemsPurgeInfo: Items that failed to update will be removed from the database
database.sankakuRateLimitWarning: Stop and try again later if you start seeing 'Failed' number constantly growing, you could have reached rate limit and/or Sankaku blocks requests from your IP.
database.skipCurrentItem: Press here to skip current item
database.useIfStuck: Use if item appears to be stuck

backupAndRestore.title: Backup & Restore
backupAndRestore.duplicateFileDetectedMsg(param=fileName): The file ${fileName: String} already exists. Do you want to overwrite it? If you choose no, the backup will be cancelled.
backupAndRestore.androidOnlyFeatureMsg: This feature is only available on Android, on Desktop builds you can just copy/paste files from/to app's data folder, respective to your system
backupAndRestore.restoreInfoMsg: Files must be in directory root
backupAndRestore.restoreDatabaseInfo: May take a while depending on the size of the database, will restart the app on success
backupAndRestore.databaseRestored: Database restored from backup! App will restart in a few seconds!
backupAndRestore.databaseFileNotFound: Database file not found or cannot be read!
backupAndRestore.restoreTagsInfo: May take a while if you have a lot of tags. If you did a database restore, you don't need to do this because it's already included in the database
backupAndRestore.tagsFileNotFound: Tags file not found or cannot be read!
backupAndRestore.operationTakesTooLongMsg: Press Hide below if it takes too long, operation will continue in background
backupAndRestore.backupFileNotFound: Backup file not found or cannot be read!

network.title: Network
network.proxySubtitle: Does not apply to streaming video mode, use caching video mode instead
network.keepEmptyForDefault: Keep empty to use default value
network.userAgentUsedOnRequests: Used for most booru requests and webview
network.setBrowserUserAgent: Tap here to set suggested browser user agent (recommended only when sites you use ban non-browser user agents):
network.selectBooruToClearCookies: Select a booru to clear cookies for or leave empty to clear all

privacy.title: Privacy
privacy.appLockMsg: Lock app manually or after idle timeout. Requires PIN/biometrics
privacy.bluronLeave: Blur screen when leaving the app
privacy.bluronLeaveMsg: May not work on some devices due to system limitations
privacy.incognitoKeyboardMsg:
Prevents keyboard from saving typing history.
Applied to most text inputs
privacy.appDisplayNameDescription: Change how the app name appears in your launcher
privacy.appAliasRestartHint: The app name change will take effect after restarting the app. Some launchers may need additional time or system reboot to update.
privacy.appAliasChangeFailed: Failed to change app name. Please try again.

performance.title: Performance
performance.lowPerformanceModeSubtitle: Recommended for old devices and devices with low RAM
performance.lowPerformanceModeDialogDisablesResource: - Disables resource-intensive elements (blurs, animated opacity, some animations...)
performance.lowPerformanceModeDialogSetsOptimal: Sets optimal settings for these options (you can change them separately later):
performance.disableVideosHelp: Useful on low end devices that crash when trying to load videos. Gives options to view video in external player or browser instead.

cache.title: Snatching & Caching
cache.pleaseEnterAValidTimeout: Please enter a valid timeout value
cache.biggerThan10: Please enter a value bigger than 10ms
cache.writeImageDataOnSave: Write image data to JSON on save
cache.videoCacheModeStream: - Stream - Don't cache, start playing as soon as possible
cache.videoCacheModeCache: - Cache - Saves the file to device storage, plays only when download is complete
cache.videoCacheModeStreamCache: - Stream+Cache - Mix of both, but currently leads to double download
cache.videoCacheNoteEnable: [Note]: Videos will cache only if 'Cache Media' is enabled.
cache.videoCacheWarningDesktop: [Warning]: On desktop Stream mode can work incorrectly for some Boorus.
cache.notAvailableForPlatform: Currently not available for this platform

itemFilters.title: Filters
itemFilters.alreadyInList(param=tag, param=type): '${tag: String}' is already in ${type: String} list
itemFilters.removeHidden: Completely hide items which match Hidden filters

sync.title: LoliSync
sync.dbError: Database must be enabled to use LoliSync
sync.pleaseEnterIPAndPort: Please enter IP address and port.
sync.selectWhatYouWantToDo: Select what you want to do
sync.senderInstructions: Start server on other device, enter its IP/port, then tap Start sync
sync.syncFavsFromHelpText1: Allows to set from where the sync should start from, useful if you already synced all your favs before and want to sync only the newest items
sync.syncFavsFromHelpText2: If you want to sync from the beginning leave this field blank
sync.syncFavsFromHelpText3: Example: You have X amount of favs, set this field to 100, sync will start from item #100 and go until it reaches X
sync.syncFavsFromHelpText4: Order of favs: From oldest (0) to newest (X)
sync.syncSnatchedFromHelpText1: Allows to set from where the sync should start from, useful if you already synced all your snatched history before and want to sync only the newest items
sync.syncSnatchedFromHelpText2: If you want to sync from the beginning leave this field blank
sync.syncSnatchedFromHelpText3: Example: You have X amount of favs, set this field to 100, sync will start from item #100 and go until it reaches X
sync.syncSnatchedFromHelpText4: Order of favs: From oldest (0) to newest (X)
sync.tabsSyncModeMerge: Merge: Merge the tabs from this device on the other device, tabs with unknown boorus and already existing tabs will be ignored
sync.tabsSyncModeReplace: Replace: Completely replace the tabs on the other device with the tabs from this device
sync.tagsSyncModePreferTypeIfNone: Preserve type: If the tag exists with a tag type on the other device and it doesn't on this device it will be skipped
sync.tagsSyncModeOverwrite: Overwrite: All tags will be added, if a tag and tag type exists on the other device it will be overwritten
sync.testConnectionHelpText1: Sends test request to other device.
sync.portAndIPCannotBeEmpty: The Port and IP fields cannot be empty!
sync.nothingSelectedToSync: You haven't selected anything to sync!
sync.receiverInstructions: Start server to receive data. Avoid public WiFi for security

about.title: About
about.appDescription: LoliSnatcher is open source and licensed under GPLv3 the source code is available on github. Please report any issues or feature requests in the issues section of the repo.
about.logoArtistThanks: A big thanks to Showers-U for letting us use their artwork for the app logo. Please check them out on Pixiv
about.releasesMsg: Latest version and full changelogs can be found at the Github Releases page:

logs.shareLogsWarningMsg: [WARNING]: Logs may contain sensitive information, share with caution!
